26
27#ifndef SSHMAC_H
28#define SSHMAC_H
29
30#include <sys/types.h>
31
32struct sshmac {
33 char *name;
34 int enabled;
35 u_int mac_len;
36 u_char *key;
37 u_int key_len;
38 int type;
39 int etm; /* Encrypt-then-MAC */
40 struct ssh_hmac_ctx *hmac_ctx;
41 struct umac_ctx *umac_ctx;
42};
43
44int mac_valid(const char *);
45char *mac_alg_list(char);
46int mac_setup(struct sshmac *, char *);
47int mac_init(struct sshmac *);
48int mac_compute(struct sshmac *, u_int32_t, const u_char *, int,
49 u_char *, size_t);
50int mac_check(struct sshmac *, u_int32_t, const u_char *, size_t,
51 const u_char *, size_t);
52void mac_clear(struct sshmac *);
53
54#endif /* SSHMAC_H */
55
